verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H5975>Stand<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> there this <S%H1697>word<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, all you of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that enter <S%H935>in<s%> at these <S%H8179>gates<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3190>Mend<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings<s%>, and I will cause you to <S%H7931>live<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

<S%H982>Trust<s%> not in <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, The <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, The <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, are these.

For if you <S%H3190>thoroughly<s%> <S%H3190>mend<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings<s%>; if you <S%H6213>thoroughly<s%> <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> between a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>;

If you <S%H6231>oppress<s%> not the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and the <S%H490>widow<s%>, and <S%H8210>shed<s%> not <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>, neither <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to your <S%H7451>hurt<s%>:

Then will I cause you to <S%H7931>live<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
<S%H982>Behold<s%>, you trust in <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>, that cannot <S%H3276>profit<s%>.

Will you <S%H1589>steal<s%>, <S%H7523>murder<s%>, and commit <S%H5003>adultery<s%>, and <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>, and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> whom you know <S%H3045>not<s%>;

And <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, We are <S%H5337>delivered<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H8441>abominations<s%>?

Is this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, become a <S%H4631>den<s%> of <S%H6530>robbers<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>? <S%H7200>Behold<s%>, even I have seen <S%H5002>it<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

But <S%H3212>go<s%> you now unto my <S%H4725>place<s%> which was in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, where I <S%H7931>set<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> what I <S%H6213>did<s%> to it <S%H6440>for<s%> the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H6213>now<s%>, because you have done all these <S%H4639>works<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H7925>you<s%>, rising up early and <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, but you <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H7121>not<s%>; and I called <S%H6030>you<s%>, but you answered not;

Therefore will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, where you <S%H982>trust<s%>, and unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, as I have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>.
And I will cast you <S%H7993>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>, as I have cast <S%H7993>out<s%> all your <S%H251>brothers<s%>, even the whole <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.

Therefore <S%H6419>pray<s%> not you for this <S%H5971>people<s%>, neither lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H7440>cry<s%> nor <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for <S%H1157>them<s%>, neither make <S%H6293>intercession<s%> to <S%H8085>me<s%>: for I will not hear you.
<S%H7200>See<s%> you not what they <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>?

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1197>kindle<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H3888>knead<s%> their <S%H1217>dough<s%>, to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3561>cakes<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and to pour <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, that they may provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.
Do they provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>? <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: do they not provoke themselves to the <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of their own <S%H6440>faces<s%>?

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H639>Behold<s%>, my anger and my <S%H2534>fury<s%> shall be poured <S%H5413>out<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>, upon <S%H120>man<s%>, and upon <S%H929>animal<s%>, and upon the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and upon the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>; and it shall <S%H1197>burn<s%>, and shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H5595>Put<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> unto your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

For I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> not unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, nor <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H1697>concerning<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> or <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>:

But this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> I <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and I will be your <S%H430>God<s%>, and you shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>: and <S%H1980>walk<s%> you in all the <S%H1870>ways<s%> that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3190>you<s%>, that it may be well unto you.

But they <S%H8085>listened<s%> <S%H5186>not<s%>, nor inclined their <S%H241>ear<s%>, but <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H4156>counsels<s%> and in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and went <S%H268>backward<s%>, and not <S%H6440>forward<s%>.

Since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that your <S%H1>fathers<s%> came forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%> I have even <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto you all my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, <S%H3117>daily<s%> rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and sending <S%H7971>them<s%>:

Yet they <S%H8085>listened<s%> not unto <S%H5186>me<s%>, nor inclined their <S%H241>ear<s%>, but <S%H7185>hardened<s%> their <S%H6203>neck<s%>: they did <S%H7489>worse<s%> than their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Therefore you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>; but they will not listen to <S%H7121>you<s%>: you shall also call unto <S%H6030>them<s%>; but they will not answer you.

But you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H1471>them<s%>, This is a nation that <S%H8085>obeys<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, nor <S%H3947>receives<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%>: <S%H530>truth<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%>, and is cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

Cut <S%H1494>off<s%> your <S%H5145>hair<s%>, O <S%H7993>Jerusalem<s%>, and cast it away, and take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> on high <S%H8205>places<s%>; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3988>rejected<s%> and <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of his <S%H5678>wrath<s%>.

For the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: they have <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, to pollute <S%H2930>it<s%>.

And they have <S%H1129>built<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H8612>Tophet<s%>, which is in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, to <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>; which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them <S%H5927>not<s%>, neither came it into my <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

<S%H3117>Therefore<s%>, behold, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that it shall no more be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H8612>Tophet<s%>, nor the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, but the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter<s%>: for they shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> in <S%H8612>Tophet<s%>, until there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And the <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and for the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and none shall frighten them <S%H2729>away<s%>.

Then will I cause to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and from the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>mirth<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride<s%>: for the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H2723>desolate<s%>.
